mapper.select: select t1.*,t2.HR_NAME as lastname from operate_log t1 left join HRP_FST.AD_EMPLOYEE_V@HR_TEST t2 on t1.user_id = t2.HR_NO ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select count(*) VISIT_TIMES from OPERATE_LOG where OPERATE_TYPE in (0,3) AND TO_CHAR(OPERATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm') = #{month}
select count(*) NOTE_NUMBER from OPERATE_LOG where OPERATE_TYPE in (2) AND TO_CHAR(OPERATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm') = #{month}

select u1.totalnumber,u2.departmentname from ( select count(*) totalnumber,t3.DEPARTMENTID from OPERATE_LOG t1 left join AUTH_USER t2 on t1.user_id = t2.loginid left join HRMRESOURCE t3 on t2.workcode = t3.workcode where t1.operate_type = '2' group by t3.DEPARTMENTID order by totalnumber desc) u1 left join HrmDepartment u2 on u1.departmentid = u2.id where u2.id is not null and rownum <9
